website_summaries.verdict: Makes an excellent vest for layering.
pros: While deceptively thin, this vest is still warm enough for fall
The elastic around the armholes means you can easily wear a thick sweater underneath
cons: Some buyers complain that the zipper isn't durable

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this like the plague. Bird poop all over the inside.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this disgusting item 0 stars! Out of the bag it looked stained, and the inside was already fraying with the down feathers coming out. I tried to gently wipe the stains off with a baby wipe and guess what?? Those black stains turned out to be solids stuck to the down feathers. They started chipping off into a black like powder. I had to cut through the nylon fabric and much to my dismay it turned out to be bird poop. Literally, animal waste stuck to the feathers. This is gone to the garbage. A shame and waste of good $19.99 on something so sick.
customer_reviews.author: Meera

customer_reviews.title: Warmth, great fit and vibrant color!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" and wear an 8-10 Us dress size. My bust is 38DD. I purchased a size "M" which zips up over my bust comfortably. The vest has a slight waist fitting rather than a straight box cut. I purchased the red vest and love the vibrancy! I wore my vest not realizing how temperature comfortable I was until I took it off. OMG what great warmth...I put the vest back on!
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly flattering! Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little outfit making vest! I ordered the green and it looks more like a hunter green than turquoise, which is a good thing. It's true to size, the vest flatters beautifully and I absolutely love it. It's light weight but still warm although not very hot.
customer_reviews.author: IShopAlotonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT, LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! Live in TX and wanted light vest for fall/winter on cool days to walk my dogs. This vest is AWESOME!!! Glad I read the reviews and ordered an extra small. I'm 5'3 and 115 lbs and the xsmall fits me perfectly...nice that has light elastic around armholes. No gaping and fits well over light sweater. Love that it dips down in back to keep backside warmer. 2 Inner pockets in addition to outer zip handwarmer pockets. For $20 BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb in SA

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great, packs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last minute before going to Iceland in November. It kept me incredibly warm and was easy to pack. The material is ridiculously soft to the touch. It leaks a fair bit, as it should for the price. Be gentle with it if you want it to last. My measurements are 42/30/44 and I bought a large. It fit great. I think the larger size wouldn't have looked as good.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Trost

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor use, Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And the blue space dyed fabric isn't as shiny as it looks in the photo, which was a relief. I bought one of these last year at Costco, but they stopped carrying the 32 Degrees version. This might be coming from the same factory, however, since the fit, weight, and features all seem to be exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute and warm. I'm 5'4 and 155 lbs. Short waisted and busty. ordered a xl and still room after zipping for thick shirt. Might be short on a long torso. Packs down. Great vest for the price.
customer_reviews.author: javelyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this vest it is exactly what I wanted. This vest is lightweight and not very puffy but I wanted one that was tight fitting like this is and thin enough to go under a big down jacket if the weather was that cold. Mostly I wear it over a sweater and have received a lot of compliments. The color is gorgeous, the pockets are warm and zip up so I don't lose my gloves. I'm very happy with this purchase. Oh and I bought XL and wear 12/14 and it fits me great but it is snug not loose.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ofner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is very cute, fits beautifully but I have a thing about cheap zippers. The zipper on this vest wasn't going to last for too many wearings. I could barely unzip it just to try on the vest. I could just tell it was too cheap. The down content is also a bit skimpy also. Too bad as it sure looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest! It is the perfect weight to layer over a sweater or long sleeved tee to retain core body heat. I had another similar vest but the fabric always got caught in the zipper (maddeningly) so I was very diligent about the zipper stitching when I searched for a replacement. This one is perfect. I also wear it under my lightweight down jacket every day when my dog and I go for our walk. The neck zips up high to keep breezes out and it does not irritate the skin when it is zipped. I wear it around the house when I feel chilled - total comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gray

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cozy vest!
customer_reviews.text: This is a WONDERFUL vest. Cozy, comfy and fits me perfectly. I ordered a large due to my 38F chest. I normally wear a 10-12 top, am 5'2" 135 athletic build. I got a beautiful iridescent purple color that just sings. This is a light weight yet warm garment. A small bag was included that it will stuff into for travel. The fabric is also soft, but very fine weight that I hope will stand up to some wear. It's warm without the bulk, so I don't feel like a walking marshmallow in it.
customer_reviews.author: Doc W8

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Flattering Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest - perfect detailing and fit. It has a nice, light weight but feels warm. I bought it to run in and have not tried it out yet, so I can't comment about heat retention or water resistance. But, the fit is flattering - smaller spaces between the stitching on the sides/under arms makes it look cinched in at the waist. For reference, I am 5'7", 138 lbs., hourglass figure, waist is small and long, 34D, and I got an XS - it is fitted but not too tight over a turtleneck and hits right at the hip/ belt line on low waisted jeans. I will be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Gem10

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this vest but the zipper didn't even last a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this vest but the zipper didn't even last a month ... the plastic just shredded and came undone from the fabric but not from itself ... I had to pull the vest over my head to take it off. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jill Honnecke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for extra warmth for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a small or medium and I didn't want this to be too big, so I ordered a small. It fit great. I was also pleasantly surprised by the color. I didn't realize it was iridescent. I love the color! It was great to have for extra warmth on recent travel to Iceland/Norway without taking up much room in the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: ythriq

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Today has been really windy and cold. I received this vest today, immediately took off my sweat shirt which I had on over a flannel shirt, and put on the vest. I was not disappointed! The vest is very comfortable and kept me warm. I bought this vest to take on a June cruise to Alaska. I don't think I am going to be disappointed. I normally wear a large, but ordered an xlarge, so I could layer underneath. It can be layered under my packable down coat without any problems. I ordered the taupe. In certain lighting it looks more like a grayish purple. I am definitely going to order another color. I highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: New Fan Jan

customer_reviews.title: I wear them in the winter over turtlenecks or sweaters so will be fine. I am 5'7" 134 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I have both this same vest at Costco with the 30 degree brand. This style looks the same but seems just a tad larger. However, I wear them in the winter over turtlenecks or sweaters so will be fine. I am 5'7" 134 lbs. and ordered the medium. Great color which is why I ordered it. It is hard to find a beautiful blue.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Long Holland

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sporty, lightweight vest that would provide a little added warmth playing golf, walking the dogs, or just being out on the go. The material is extremely soft and comfortable and the fit is nice - slightly tapered and doesn’t look bulky. The only downside is that the exterior pockets are a tiny bit small to fit your hands into comfortably - but they zip up and there are additional interior pockets on both sides. It also comes with little pouch that you can fold the vest into which helps when you want to layer up or down. All in all, a good buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MC22

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fitted warm vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 5'7" and slim. I bought her the small and it fits perfectly. She loves the fitted look, the color is so beautiful and she's a trainer in upstate NY where it gets very cold. She loves that it is thin so she can work in it indoors, but it's warm. She loves that she's in a down vest that doesn't make her look like the Michelin Man. She gets compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality vest we purchased for our daughter. She’s approx 5’4” and 104 lbs, small fit her perfectly. So maybe you can judge the size by that. She uses it for jogging outdoors in cold weather. It keeps her warm and not weigh her down.
customer_reviews.author: HBTC#1

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vest!!!
customer_reviews.text: I truly wished I could purchase in every color! This is light weight and can be worn under a coat for added warmth. It is as light as a feather and easy to move in! I tend to keep the heat low during the winter to take advantage of the cost of energy since I can put on a simple vest like this and move about the house in total comfort. This keeps my back and chest warm without the extra bulk of a heavy jacket! I am so very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Clarice

customer_reviews.title: Returned for various reasons
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers gave this vest raving reviews. I returned the vest because I found the vest to be extremely thin and it had a very inferior zipper. It is a very fitted style. It would be extremely hard to wear anything but a very thin top under it. I am a size 12 and usually wear at least a sweater under a vest. When I first put this on over only a t-shirt, zipped it up and moved around a bit the zipper opened from the bottom. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight & comfortable to wear. Has the built in bag for easy roll up storage. Zip side pockets are great. Nice surprise inside pockets. Perfect for keys, lipstick or cellphone. I have escema but the feathers DONT come out & jacket doesn’t bother my skin. Haven’t washed yet but would hand wash & line dry. I’m 5”1, 135-140, 40C, broad shoulders. Tried S,M & LG. Ended up keeping the LG. Ordered more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Qualified Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same vest in silver, which I love. However, the rose was somewhat larger than the silver, although they were both supposed to be the same size. I am between medium and large (depending on the number of layers I am wearing); the silver fits great; the rose seemed too roomy. So, I returned the latter. However, I would not hesitate to recommend this product. (If I could only believe the people who made it were paid a decent wage!)
customer_reviews.author: miriamc

customer_reviews.title: easy to
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet tested whether it is warm or not, but it fits me well, not too tight or loose, I'm 122.4 lbs and ordered size S. The color is soft gray, easy to fold
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and very lightweight! I typically wear a size large in tops and the large fit me just right with a little room to spare (I could probably wear a lightweight sweater underneath it but maybe not a heavy weight sweater). As a sidenote, apparently I’m particular about zippers, especially on pockets as they seem to cut my hands up but these zippers pass with flying colors. I’ve recently ordered many different styles of vests trying to find one that I like, and this is the winner! I’m sure I’ll be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: patterma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the vest, got the white in Large. I wear them walking & running they are light and warm but they are breathable also which is what I was looking for without paying $100 or more for it. The photos are from after I wash (and wore it) the vest I added a very tiny bit of bleach (it came a little smelly & it is white so it worked) then put it in the dyer and it came out perfect & very fluffy! Worth the money!! Will be buying more colors. (Note: I wash EVERYTHING I purchase whether it be from Amamzon or a store before I wear it)
customer_reviews.author: KMM1925

customer_reviews.title: Great vest, poor quality of zipper
customer_reviews.text: The fit, weight and subtle styling of this vest are great! I'm always a little cold, so having a lightweight vest like this is perfect. It even fits beautifully under other outer wear for a bit more warmth. However, the zipper has pulled apart and the vest no longer can be zipped. I don't know if the company would replace - I haven't had it all that long (not even one year!). I am very disappointed about this malfunction!
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Brill

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive vest with the side panels and slimming cut. It is lightweight and exactly what I wanted to add a warm layer. BTW, I saw almost the exact vest (different color than I bought here) in a store that promotes itself to have lower cost clothing, and it was $80. I consider this to be a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: heyjudesings

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Stitches already coming undone, feathers coming out.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known that you get what you pay for. I have worn this item 3 times, have not washed, and it is already falling apart. Stitches are coming undone, there is a tear and feathers are pouring out. Very disappointed. I'll spend the extra $$ on a quality brand next time. Update. This has been hanging in my closet waiting to be taken somewhere to be repaired. I have not touched it in weeks, and when I pulled it out today, the seam was coming apart even more and feathers are ALL over my closet. This vest was warm the 3 times I wore it, so I'm extremely disappointed that it is falling apart already.
customer_reviews.author: mkate88

customer_reviews.title: Not true XPOSURZONE vest; not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Last year I ordered this vest in large, winter white. It was exactly as shown, lightweight, and I was happy with purchase. I needed a smaller size so ordered a medium and a small in winter white. What arrived was sent from a company called ZLane that is falsely selling jackets that are not as shown. This vest is completely different. Ivory rather than white. Huge armholes rather than fitted. Boxier cut. No vertical size panels. Different zipper pulls. Not the same brand. AND they sent me a 2XL rather than small or medium. I would order another from XPOSURZONE, but not from ZLane. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: book collector

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, color as in photo, zipper seems strong.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this very light weight jacket. Color is very attractive. I am 135 lb and 5' 5" tall and this fits like a glove. I probably would be better with a large, although I'm keeping the medium. As I live in a warm climate, I do not have to consider wearing a heavy sweater under it. Would advise others of my size to pick large, if they need to wear warmer sweaters under it. Going to order another one is a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Webbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Color doesn't match picture but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Color not as expected. The picture shows a bright green with turquoise undertones. What I received is a very dark forest green with black undertones. There is very little filling, so a nice slim line and it is fine for California winters but might add much warmthin real winter weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Vest
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, lightweight puffer vest. Seems nice and warm. Not at all bulky. Could easily be worn underneath a jacket. I've worn it as an outdoor piece alone over a sweater tunic and stayed warm in temperature around 55 F. Ordered the grey and have ordered another Xposurzone vest in blue from Amazon. Can't beat the price and versatility of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lightweight vest! It fits just as expected, some said that it ran large but that isn't what I experienced. It has a nice shape, perfect for women and it's even slightly longer in the back so that you can wear with leggings! The light grey is a little darker than I expected, but it is still a beautiful color and I can definitely see myself buying more colors.
customer_reviews.author: rlynk

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Vest
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest and get compliments on it all the time. I used it while I was deployed and plan to use it on a road trip around the US because of how compact it can pack away. Nice and warm too!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY VEST
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about this vest is how very soft it is. The Pine Green color is pretty. I'm 5'2" - 5 '3" , 110 pounds, and the small fits loose enough to wear a mid-weight sweater under it. An extra-small would fit well with just a blouse or light-weight sweater underneath. The vest appears to be well made and is good looking. Would like to get some of the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLue

customer_reviews.title: Fits, lightweight, compacts into attached bag
customer_reviews.text: I just received my vest. The zipper didn't work completely smoothly the first time trying to unzip it, due to the lightweight material, I think. It wasn't hard to make it work, after I realized what I needed to do (get the material out of the way). It is very lightweight, and packs down small. I think I will make my bag even smaller, as it could take up less space if it were packed tighter. It fit me perfectly (Large size... I'm 150 lbs, 5ft 3 inches. I usually try getting large sizes.) I'm quite pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the style
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a “hot white”party on a cruise, so I needed it to packable and white. I am happy with the style, quality and light weight. It really does easily fold into its own included travel bag. But it is really not white, but more like a cream color. I am going to keep this vest because I like it and will use it, but I still need to buy something for the party, so I am disappointed by that.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great Super Lightweight Down Filled Packable Zip Front Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...but couldn't find a women's extra small size anywhere...leave it to Amazon to come thru...AGAIN! I purchased basic black but just might come back for a few more pretty colors...so happy I found this on Amazon as I got it over night...& just in time for cooler nights in the New England...Come on Fall/Winter...I'm ready for ya!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Zipper Broke
customer_reviews.text: Very cute jacket, but zipper is plastic and broke after just a few wearings. Disappointed in that, but if that hadn't happened, I would be happy with it and would otherwise recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendiful

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned prior to receiving this order that the down would show through the light colored fabric. No problem there! This vest is beautiful. It fits just as expected and I can't get over how light it feels. It will be perfect for traveling from frigid Michigan to sunny Bahamas...easy to pack up and next to no weight. I'm considering a second vest to keep in my car for surprise weather changes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pockrandt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: This garment was not as pictured. I expected a nicely tailored vest. I liked the high neck and also I like the hem at the bottom. As you can see the garment that was sent does not include those features. Also the listed price on the garment was less than half of what I paid and that’s what it looks like - cheap. The shipping speed is s l o w.
customer_reviews.author: Helma

customer_reviews.title: Love it for cold to in-between weather
customer_reviews.text: I love this for dress down for casual weekend of shopping, coffee shop excursions and still a great cover-up for movie theatre nights. This is the perfect item. It travels well and does not easily wrinkle. Fits well and the color is excellent. I want to buy two more just in case i lose this one You should buy this for yourself or as a gift. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: C.K. One (The Avid Reader)

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Warm and Great Fitting!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, Warm and Great Fitting! Winter White had only 1 grey down cluster near the surface that I was able to move so it looks great. Purchased the Medium size to wear with a single light layer underneath (36D bust, sizes 8-10). Size up if you want to wear heavier layers under. This is my second one, purchased a Large in Navy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm loving it
customer_reviews.text: After looking at the measurement chart I ordered a size small. I usually wear a medium but the small fit perfectly with a little room to spare for an extra layer. I bought it for running but it hasn't been cold enough yet, but just trying it on it was warm. I'm 5'6", 127lbs., thin build. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn it yet, but the quality seems good. Awesome to have this as a resource tucked away in my suitcase. This seemed a bit wide at the waist/bottom to me, but I am quite slim (5'7", 116 lbs) so this may not be a concern to everyone. Doesn't bother me enough to return as I will likely wear this over bulkier sweaters/sweatshirts, so I don't expect air drafting up :-)
customer_reviews.author: michele Kohl

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to find this & have all the color options
customer_reviews.text: This is the second vest I've bought of this brand, lost my first one on a 15 mile hike & wasn't about to do it again to find it. I was so happy to find this & have all the color options. 10/10 would buy again, forever. Used to be sold at Costco, but they don't have great color choices
customer_reviews.author: Caralee M.

customer_reviews.title: Flattering vest
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this vest exceeded my expectations. I wasn’t sure which size to buy. I am 5’7” and weigh around 145 pounds. Although I normally wear a large in tops and jackets, I chose a medium and it fits perfect! I based my decision off the measuring chart, and it actually worked! It is lightweight, warm, not too shiny of a material, and had a flattering shape for a vest. All in all, I am pretty darn happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a Large but had to return for an extra large which fits great! I wanted to be able to layer it over other tops so needed the extra room. I LOVE the color I ordered charcoal melange. The vest is light but keeps me quite warm most of the time without having to bother with a coat. Also looks stylish and this color goes great over almost any other color. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: golfer gal

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I tried a number of brand name down vests at various price points but eventually ordered this one because of the good reviews even though I was unfamiliar with the brand. It is perfect. Fits very well and is very warm. Extremely light weight and squishes into a very small stuff sack. I wanted it as an extra layer for hiking (over a fleece jacket and under a rain jacket) and it is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a fall/spring vest and couldn’t decide which brand or style to get. I came across this product that had good review and price. I must say for my first vest...it meet my expectations! I so love the color and how light and packable it is. I have not washed it but will post back on what my experience would be after washing. I only rated it 4 just for 1 thing, the smell when I received it, i had to hang it for a day and the smell went away. It kinda smell like duck feathered pillow.
customer_reviews.author: LifeGigabytes

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest! Very light and packable. Based on reviews I bought a small. I am 5'7 and 138 pounds. The fit is tapered. I do not wear bulky sweaters under my vest. If you do, then you may want a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for travel
customer_reviews.text: Packanle light and comfortable dress up with a scarf add a bit of warmth open. Comfortable. Wonderful addition to travel wardrpbe!!
customer_reviews.author: S. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Thin and lightweight but super warm!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife - she absolutely loves it and although it seems thinner than I would expect, she says it's very warm. I'd highly recommend this vest and will purchase another just like it in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: The vest is lightweight, warm, and sturdy. It can be rolled up and stored in a shopping bag or backpack with room to spare. It washes well; need to pull apart some of the inner material to keep it lofting. The color is fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: it was meh
customer_reviews.text: This vest fit just fine and the color was nice, but it looked a little cheap and didn't seem well constructed. I ordered a different quilted vest instead from Amazon that was about the same price and looked much nicer, so I returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: missippibelle

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for an upcoming trip
customer_reviews.text: OK for this little money, it is perfect for an upcoming trip. Folds up very small with its own pouch. Looks nice on and I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: I love the down vest
customer_reviews.text: 1. I love the down vest. The color and the fit are exactly what I expected. 2. The only issue is that I prefer straight hem over the CURVED one. If you have the straight one, I would like to switch to a straight hemmed vest with the same color and size, and purchase another one in white or black. If this is what you have, I will keep this one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MENGDI   XU

customer_reviews.title: Great Puffy Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Love this puffy vest! This is my second one, gave the first to my daughter-in-law as she loves it as well. I ordered up to an XL only because I wanted to wear it over everything. Super light weight but perfect for colder CA weather (which isn't all that cold, but if your a born and bread Californian, we think cold is 50 degrees). Definitely getting other colors
customer_reviews.author: HNS4vr

customer_reviews.title: I didn't waste anytime, I found the one that was marked ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a white vest, so I started my search on Amazon. I didn't waste anytime, I found the one that was marked "customer favorite" and bought it. I'm glad I did! It is so warm & soft, I just love the feel of it! Very pleased, will definitely consider another by this company!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently returned a well known brand puffer vest costing 6 times as much that I bought her for Christmas because it was too bulky and the cost wasn't in line with her values. So I don't know what's good for me and I decided to buy this vest based on the positive reviews. She says she loves everything about this vest. She normally buys medium and the fit was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: handyman1234

customer_reviews.title: 5’7” 145 lb athletic build- Small
customer_reviews.text: 5’7” 145 lb athletic build- I bought a small and it fit perfectly. I was still able to wear a long sleeve and jacket underneath, and it’s not bulky so I was able to wear another jacket(s) over it comfortably. I wore it as one of the many layers I wore in 10°F weather in Beijing. I love that it’s easily packable and has pockets to keep your hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It was gorgeous and warm but way too loose. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was gorgeous and warm but way too loose. I'm normally a S or M. I ordered S. I actually needed an XS. I returned and never bought a new one because the XS were sold out or discontinued. I'll check back again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: designed just like my 32-degree vest, but obviously not the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Not typical to US product standards
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, nice fabric. I ordered XL; then, I gave it to my daughter who would normally wear a small. It fit her perfectly. I would never recommend this product unless the purchaser who wants XL goes way up. A small or medium should order an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Hauxhurst

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: order up if busty. Cute, warm, color as shown. There is a darker colored feather trapped right at chest line that is unappealing but didnt notice until after removed tags.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi T

customer_reviews.title: A nice Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for my Wife how is very picky when it come to her clothes. She likes that this jacket is very light and still keeps her warm. she was only disappointed with the length. However she liked it enough to order a second jacket for her Sister
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is just the right size (Large) for me- 5'1" - 125 lb. It's stylish and comfortable. I must say I sent back the first one as the zipper broke the first time I wore it. However, I had previously bought and worn another of these vests in a different color and no zipper problem so I am hoping this will last.
customer_reviews.author: B B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vest that would keep me warm during a half marathon. It did just that! It kept me warm and I layer it below my lighter winter fleece. The zipper is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: DeathCab4c36

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a costume, and it's surprisingly great quality! It fits well enough that I've worn it out and about multiple times. I don't think it's as warm as some other brands you can buy, but for the price, it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: DorianaGraye

customer_reviews.title: Slim-fitting and warm

I did have a little down leak out on the first wear but other than that, it's perfect. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kymbal Roley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Looooove it. Bought it for hiking because I like my arms to be free. It was lightweight yet warm enough to hike in 40 degree weather with nothing but a long sleeve shirt underneath. Love the zipper pockets too.
customer_reviews.author: NonyaB

customer_reviews.title: like this vest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but runs small.

I will enjoy vest this for many years.

customer_reviews.author: Jenlou

customer_reviews.title: Had to order twice

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Great but runs WAY LARGE!

I recommend TWO sizes down unless you plan on wearing it over many layers which isn't necessary because of how warm it is! However there was NOT an XXS so that was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Maya D

customer_reviews.title: Park of iceland summer gear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a July trip to Iceland and I found myself wearing it almost every day. It is cute enough to wear from hiking to walking around town. The fourth day I wore it the zipper did break, but I still could wear it as an open vest so it wasn't the worst. I got the navy blue color which I felt matched a lot of different outfits.
customer_reviews.author: V. N. Palkar

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest! I wore it for golf and it was great and just wore it again while out shopping. I had so many compliments on it that a friend of mine is ordering 3 of them for x-mas gifts. I like how it comes with a little bag and the entire thing fits into it. It does wash nicely.
customer_reviews.author: kimmi

customer_reviews.title: Very warm vests yet lightweight & great with layering

I’m super pleased w the purchase as I much rather layer then feel stuffed into a coat. Super pleased! Bonus they can fold up into a compact square in your camping or low on space packing!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Tappan

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a great buy. Unfortunately the zipper keeps coming apart
customer_reviews.text: First couple of times wearing, I thought this was a great buy. Unfortunately the zipper keeps coming apart. Having a bad zipper on a product, make the product worthless to me. Very disappointed! If you don't mind not having it zipped, the material is comfortable & very light weight as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but the red color is not a true ...

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought it in two colors.

customer_reviews.text: Seriously disappointed. Not much to it, very thin. And incredibly small. I ordered a XXL to go over several layers. I gave it to a friend who wears a small & it's barely too big for her.

customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Close, but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: I like this color, but have a very similar vest by a different maker that I prefer. This one looks identical, but the zipper is touchy and it doesn't keep me as warm. Not sure if the fill is lower or what, but it's disappointing.
